com.anotherservice.io

Class FileWriter

  • Object
    • FileWriter

  • public class FileWriter
extends Object
    This class provides easy access for writing text file content. Binary content support is not guaranteed.
    Author:
    Simon Uyttendaele

             String content)
                      throws IOException
        Writes some text to a file
        Parameters:
        filename - the name and path of the file
        content - the text content to write
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(File file,
             String content)
                      throws IOException
        Writes some text to a file
        Parameters:
        file - the target file
        content - the text content to write
        Throws:
        IOException

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(OutputStream os,
             String content)
                      throws IOException
        Writes some content to an output stream. Even though this method is desined for File writes, it will work seamlessly with any OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        os - the output stream
        content - the text content to write
        Throws:
        IOException
        Note:
        • Support for binary data is subject to general casting rules from int to char.
        • This method does not close the output stream

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(String filename,
             InputStream content)
                      throws IOException
        Writes the content of an input stream to a file
        Parameters:
        filename - the name and path of the file
        content - the stream content to write
        Throws:
        IOException
        Note:
        This method does not close the input stream

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(File file,
             InputStream content)
                      throws IOException
        Writes the content of an input stream to a file
        Parameters:
        file - the target file
        content - the stream content to write
        Throws:
        IOException
        Note:
        This method does not close the input stream

      • writeFile

        public static void writeFile(OutputStream os,
             InputStream content)
                      throws IOException
        Writes the content of an input stream to an output stream. Even though this method is desined for File writes, it will work seamlessly with any OutputStream.
        Parameters:
        os - the output stream
        content - the stream content to write
        Throws:
        IOException
        Note:
        • Support for binary data is subject to general casting rules from int to char.
        • This method does not close the output stream
        • This method does not close the input stream
